about_the_game:
After Dark - post-apocalyptic shooter, with an open procedurally generated world that recreates a real-life area using geodata.

About the game
Get into an alternative world in which an unknown catastrophe occurred, which led to the complete disappearance of mankind.
Immerse yourself in the gloomy atmosphere of abandoned cities sent by unknown creatures and collect clues that can shed light on what happened.

Key features of the game
More than 40 types of various enemies, with unique characteristics
Dozens of different weapons, including melee, firearms, grenades and energy weapons
An endless open world that is created as the player moves.
All locations in the game are recreated based on real-life areas.
